short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Santa Dash is a fun and free game right on the chrome extension. The simple way to play is to overcome obstacles to win

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Santa Dash is a racing-like game, however this is a humanoid character and your task is to overcome snowman obstacles along with eating gift boxes to get a high score. If you touch the snowmen while moving, you will lose. Play by simply moving the arrows left and right
